group_1.textLeft: She's so energetic...

group_1.textRight: Ahaha...

group_1.textLeft: You look kinda listless? What's got you so down?

group_1.textRight: Well, only compared to you...
Awawa...
S-so, what's this about?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, check this out!

group_1.textRight: "Crime Intelligence Map"?

group_1.textLeft: My bae told me about it.
It's a map of areas where crimes and accidents@occur frequently, and when.
I used it to scope out the crimes in Takarazaki.

group_1.textRight: Wow, that's amazing!
So did you find anything out...?

group_1.textLeft: You bet!
The more crimes there are, the darker the@red color is, yeah?
Check out the area around the station we met,@isn't it super dangerous?

group_1.textRight: You're right...
No wonder Hagumun got robbed there...

group_1.textLeft: This is our breakthrough, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: You think the Witch is around there...?

group_1.textLeft: So, there's a bunch of red areas, right?
I couldn't narrow it down to just one.
But, when I checked the times, this one's a@perfect match!★
There's a clear increase in the evening and@night around there!

group_1.textRight: I see!
Yeah, that's when Witches become active...!

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's when crime increases everywhere,@but this spot's crazy bad!
It doesn't make sense unless it's a Witch!

group_1.textRight: Witches seem to be causing trouble...but we@can't locate any...
Crimes and accidents are increasing, but not in@proportion to the number of Witches...
Maybe our theory about there being a single@strong Witch is true...!

group_1.textLeft: We might've nailed it★
So, let's investigate starting here!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...!
("Yeah"...? I'm just being swept along by her@again...)

group_1.textLeft: But first, let's go hunting in the other areas.

group_1.textRight: This reaction is similar to the Familiar we@just killed...

group_1.textLeft: Is the Witch chasing after us because we@killed its Familiar?
If we go straight to the station where crime@happens, regular folk might get in the way.
But if it chases one of you, then we've@got a chance to lead it away.

group_1.textRight: Okay, then I'll lead it to the alleyways.

group_1.textLeft: It took the bait!

group_1.textCenter: Hey, you three, get away from here!
There's a scary Witch here, so now's@the time to run!

group_1.textRight: Or something like that anyways, lmao.

group_1.textLeft: Woah, the weird hero from yesterday!

group_1.textRight: Hallo!

group_1.textLeft: Hallo! We meet again.
Aren't you getting a little too mixed up with the@evils of the world?

group_1.textRight: Leave it to us and get away from here!

group_1.textLeft: Um, but, we brought it here...!
We're responsible for this Witch...!
Yeah, we're sorry, we didn't mean to trouble you!

group_1.textRight: Wha, you're Magical Girls?!
I can take a guess, but is the other one a@Magical Girl too?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, this cutie here is another Magical Girl!
How about the five of us work together?@That way, it'll be over in a flash★
